articles.author: Thomas Biesheuvel
articles.title: Billionaire boss Ivan Glasenberg makes one last coal deal in final days at Glencore - News24
articles.description: Glencore has agreed to buy stakes owned by BHP Group and Anglo American Plc in the Cerrejon thermal coal mine, giving the world’s biggest shipper of the fuel complete control of the asset.
articles.content:
Glencore’s billionaire boss Ivan Glasenberg has made one final deal in his last week at the company, buying out two rivals in a giant Colombian coal mine.

articles.title: 'History made': Fil-Am trans woman to represent Nevada in Miss USA 2021 - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: A Filipino-American trans woman is set to compete in Miss USA 2021 after winning the Miss Nevada title on Monday (Manila time).
articles.content:
A Filipino-American trans woman is set to compete in Miss USA 2021 after winning the Miss Nevada title on Monday (Manila time).

articles.title: F9 Earns $70 Million and Sets Pandemic Record In Its Opening Weekend Box Office Debut - IGN - IGN
articles.description: In its first weekend at the domestic box office, F9 has earned over $70 million USD and has set a new North American record during the COVID-19 pandemic.
